Text:
Hi!
I take the courage ( again) to ask you if there is something out there, like the ( Essential House Plan Collection 1500 Best Selling Home Plans ) you had uploaded time ago. Plans of houses that is to say. ( European if possible ).
Thank you again for all your useful uploads.
My dear friend are you interested in plans only or even software to create your own plans?

Hi and thank you for your interest.
I dont know what you have in mind regarding software.
I have found many programs here at piratebay.
Personally I use Autocad for 2D, and for 3D I use principally ChiefArchitect X2 version 12,4,,0,23. 
From last year I don't see any  arount new versions of Chief ( even at Demonoid).
However I am interested principally for modern plans of residential and countryside houses of European style.
Thank again and don't feel obligate to find at all costs this material. I have already download many useful books from you.
